<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Buffer Security Check implementation inserts windows specific callback into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// code. On windows, &#95;&#95;security&#95;check&#95;cookie call gets call everytime function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is return without fixup. Since this function is defined in runtime library,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it incures cost of call in dll which simply does comparison and returns most</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// time. With Fixup, We selective move to call in DLL only if comparison fails.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"></CodeLine>
